website_summaries.verdict: A good investment in terms of preparing for the GMAT. There is no substitute to practicing with real, previously administered GMAT questions, and this book offers hundreds of them.
pros: These are the only review materials that feature questions from previous, officially-administered GMAT exams
cons: If you want to take a deep dive and really become an expert in each area, we highly advise purchasing supplementary review materials

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bundle that came with all 3 books and the online access codes. I bought it a couple of months ago but didn't get the chance to read them/use the online access until now that the semester is over. First, I absolutely love the books! Everything is easy to find and well organized. Second, I am in love with the online questions because I get to choose how I will take the questions, how many, the difficulty of the questions, and make notes on each questions and review everything at the end. It's really fun and I feel that this will help me get a good score on the GMAT (fingers crossed!)
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: My Access code for the online help didn't work!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specially because it had the online resources, but I couldn't get my access code to work even though everything was brand new. I couldn't find any help or support with this. The books are great, but I am really upset I am not able to use the online resources.
customer_reviews.author: Fabio Dario Rivera Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Only use if you need to start at the basics...
customer_reviews.text: These books are not very good. If you have a lot of time to study and haven’t done this material in a long time they would be a good way to start out. Definitely don’t get all 3 books. These questions are much easier than the real test and only good for building basics.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Zuttah

customer_reviews.title: Would not have bought if i noticed Wiley was the publisher
customer_reviews.text: unable to use online access endless emails to get codes to work im a busy student by the time it was resolved it was too late to use the product. This is my third time being the victim of wiley products two of my classes have required wiley text books and online access I have never had a good experience with a wiley product. had i taken the time to notice this was a wiley product i would not have even thought about buying it.
customer_reviews.author: chandler

customer_reviews.title: Great but check for bundles
customer_reviews.text: This comes with a ton of questions right from the makers. While it’s good, it doesn’t teach you like Manhattan Prep will so use that if you need more prep. Also, check out official GMAT bundles for extra practice tests so you can save money
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Spitz

customer_reviews.title: They’re fine
customer_reviews.text: I got into my MBA program so... I suppose these were worth it. The online practice tests were helpful and everything was well organized. The material is pretty basic but the guide was a good refresher.
customer_reviews.author: Anton Fredrik

customer_reviews.title: Cover Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening the books I noticed that the front cover of the "Verbal Guide Review" had been damaged. It looks to have been cut with a knife or razor blade. This will not impact the usability of the books, but I would like to sell them after I have taken the GMAT, and this will lower the resale value. Is there anything that can be done to help this situation? Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Rking

customer_reviews.title: Buy this, but use online version only
customer_reviews.text: The content is nice and very helpful in preparing for the exam, but don't use paper version - go online, it is much more convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Evgeny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Study Help
customer_reviews.text: Great study books! There are lots of review questions in the books alone but the online access codes included in each book allow for even more practice.
customer_reviews.author: Sutton Kredt

customer_reviews.title: Product did what it said on the cover
customer_reviews.text: Went thru the book in a week. Did all the questions. Took the real gmat test. Got a good score and now in school. Looking back. Not sure if i needed to buy as I could have borrowed them at the local library.
customer_reviews.author: Ta

customer_reviews.title: Great book but can have improvement
customer_reviews.text: I understand this is probably the best study material for GMAT, but some of the questions are ambiguous. I hope it won't happen in the real exam.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good Study Book
customer_reviews.text: These study books mostly lived up to my reviews but I wish it had more step by step learning sections
customer_reviews.author: Chase S.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS BOOK
customer_reviews.text: Go with Kaplan, they offer a much more comprehensive and instructive book. This guide only has questions and answers, and does not provide instructions or any of the problem solving methods that Kaplan does. I would try and return mine but I decided to burn it instead.
customer_reviews.author: Kazizganthi

customer_reviews.title: Very good.
customer_reviews.text: Hope I could pass the GMAT exam with a good score.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky Zhang

customer_reviews.title: GMAT Guru
customer_reviews.text: Its the official book. I feel like a lot of things were included that would help me prepare for the exam.
customer_reviews.author: Ashesh

customer_reviews.title: New book
customer_reviews.text: The books are completely new and online codes are included.
customer_reviews.author: MOHAMMAD RAKIBUL ISLAM

customer_reviews.title: useful
customer_reviews.text: Too heavy but useful! I prefer paper book instand of e-book. Fight on !
customer_reviews.author: Joey Q.

customer_reviews.title: Online portion of this is unusable
customer_reviews.text: After several emails and calls to activate the online portion of this product, I am giving up. This is not user friendly at all. I suggest looking elsewhere for online training, or at least valuing this purchase as only having the hardcopy paper to work with.
customer_reviews.author: andrew white

customer_reviews.title: Helped raise my score 130 points!
customer_reviews.text: Worth the purchase! I raised my score 130 points without even completely finishing all of them (I did all the review material sections and probably 50% of the practice problems)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: guide to GMAT
customer_reviews.text: the shipment was very fast to Israel, and it suppose to be the best guide, since it's the official guide to GMAT
customer_reviews.author: sharon haimov

customer_reviews.title: The GMAT Official Guide 2019 PIN is Not Working
customer_reviews.text: Good morning, I purchased a GMAT Official Guide 2019 Bundle from GMAC through Amazon. The PIN for the Official Guide is not working. Could you resolve the issue for me? Thx!
customer_reviews.author: El Duque

customer_reviews.title: Best source for the exam
customer_reviews.text: I like them. They are like a bible for gmat exam
customer_reviews.author: vinay kalakuntla

product_meta.title: GMAT Official Guide 2019 Bundle: Books + Online
